titleStmt.title: Act for settling the quiet and peace of the church. Edinburgh, the twelfth day of June, one thousand six hundred ninety three.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Parliament. Committee of Estates.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to their most excellent Majesties,
